attributes.action: The Government to fund research into childhood vaccines for COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
Myself, along with thousands of other people have an extremely clinically vulnerable child and feel this would give us hope to get some sort of normality back into our lives during this pandemic.

We have been shielding our son since March 2020 and with clinically extremely vulnerable people over the age of 16 being offered a vaccine I feel our children have been forgotten about.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to look into funding research into a childhood vaccine for COVID-19.
